entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
